title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
In a pan, cook bacon until crispy. Remove and set aside.
Add cooked spaghetti to the pan with bacon fat. Toss to coat.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 2 hours.
Grill or bake the chicken until fully cooked.
In a pan, sauté onions until golden brown.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and garam masala, then add the cooked chicken.
Simmer for another 5 minutes and serve hot.
